subject: Bank Name: WOORI BANK
body:
Bank Name: WOORI BANK
Bank Address: Hoe Hyeon-dong, Jung-gu, Seoul, South Korea
SIR
We received an email and call from the U.N to contact you regarding
your long over due contact payment which you have not have received we
decided to contact regarding your payment and we are giving you 72
hours to comply so that we can release this fund to you we are waiting
for your respond.
Yours Faithfully,
CEO: LEE WON-DUK
Bank Name: WOORI BANK
Bank Address: Hoe Hyeon-dong, Jung-gu, Seoul, South Korea

subject: Re:   Bank Name: WOORI BANK
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your concern about my overdue payment. Could you please provide more details about this? For instance, what is the exact amount that is overdue and from which transaction or service is this related to?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Aurora
